title: within the period of one year from the date of demolition of the building and complete it within a period of five years
clause_text: within the period of one year from the date of demolition of the building and complete it within a period of five years. In the meantime the landlord/s or Co-operative Housing Societies of existing tenants shall make arrangement of alternate accommodation of tenants.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
